text: @CNNBusiness They seemed like a pretty solid company! Covid-19 pushed plenty companies to extinction, guess what we thought was a view from outside of financial wealth has proved to be different from inside looking out! Prayers🙏🏾💯. Hope they can somehow recover. 👔🧦👞🧥
